v0.0.3.description:
# Nonogram for Archipelago!
(you might also know this a Picross)

Play the game over at 
https://nonogram-ap.netlify.app/

Here's some pointers:
- You unlock clues the more squares you mark (black and white) correctly.
- Almost all clues are hidden at the start, they are shuffled into the multiworld.
- A hidden clue shows as a `?`, which is always a number of at least 1. This actually adds an interesting dimension to Picross, you'll see!
- You don't have to guess in this puzzle, so please don't :)
- You can solve all puzzles by just looking at each row and column individually.
- 1000+ puzzles are randomly generated
- Please click the `help` button in-game for controls.

(game files are here if you're interested https://github.com/spinerak/NonogramAP)
v0.0.3.title: Nonogram for AP 0.0.3
